hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Twenty-three is number one!^And thirty-one is number two!

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Green Rupee# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Nayru's Love# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: Did you know that Dark Link's max health is equal to @'s max health?

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.
